TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlDataRecord extends System.Object implements class System.Data.IDataRecord

summary.span: 表示单个数据行及其元数据。

span.span: Represents a single row of data and its metadata.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类使用连同从托管的代码存储过程将结果集发送到客户端。This class is used together with to send result sets to the client from managed code stored-procedures. 如果编写公共语言运行时 (CLR) 应用程序，则应重新使用现有`SqlDataRecord`而不是每次创建新的对象。When writing common language runtime (CLR) applications, you should re-use existing `SqlDataRecord` objects instead of creating new ones every time. 创建很多新`SqlDataRecord`对象无法严重消耗内存，并对性能产生负面影响。Creating many new `SqlDataRecord` objects could severely deplete memory and adversely affect performance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建几个对象，描述记录的列元数据，并创建。The following example shows how to create several objects, which describe the column metadata of a record, and creating a . 列的值设置和通过使用发送到调用程序类。The column values of the are set and the is sent to the calling program by using the class. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlDataRecord Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlDataRecord Samples/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlDataRecord Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlDataRecord Samples/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以获取二进制值的单次调用中或小区块中。This method enables you to obtain a binary value either in a single call or in chunks. 小区块中获取的值可用于大的值或未知大小的值。Getting the value in chunks is useful for large values or values of unknown size. 若要获取几个块区中的值，分配的块大小和调用的字节数组重复，调整`fieldOffset`参数相应地在每次调用。To obtain the value in several chunks, allocate a byte array of the chunk-size and call repeatedly, adjusting the `fieldOffset` parameter accordingly in each call.
